GlobalValueSet.description: Household Composition Group provides a description of the makeup of a household, leveraging information about the residents and their relationships to define the dynamics and size of the household. They are into the following:-2PERSON:2 adult occupants-EXTFAM:>2 adult occupants with 1 or 2 surnames-FAMCHLD:2 adult occupants and likely to be children in household-GROUP:>2 adults with more than two surnames-MARRIED:1 male & 1 female occupant with same surname-SINGLE:1 occupant
